Flexible.Title: Example for the usage of RFS rules
Flexible.Code: <sites> <workplace-server>http://www.workplace.com</workplace-server> <default-uri>/sites/default/</default-uri> <site server="http://www.default.com" uri="/sites/default/"/> <site server="http://www.site-one.com" uri="/sites/site1/"/> <site server="http://www.site-two.com" uri="/sites/site2/"/> </sites>
